extendedInfo.description: AmazingText will make your homescreen more beautiful, special and personalized.With AmazingText you can create custom and amazing text widgets, with cool fonts and lots of effects.Make your homescreen look exactly the way you want!*NEW* Launch apps or shortcuts when clicking on the AmazingText Widgets!You can even combine it with certain Lockscreen replacement apps (e.g. WidgetLocker) and have your amazing text widget displayed right on your Lockscreen!* To get started, add the widget "AmazingText" to your homescreen* Enter your custom text* Select your font (over 40 fonts are available - AmazingText Plus includes even more!)* Select your font style, color, size, etc.* Add effects (such as Glow, Reflection, Noise, Sepia, Emboss,Gradient, etc.)* Place your beautiful widget on the homescreen* Share your creations with your friends directly from the app* AmazingText Plus includes more presets, fonts and effects.Like us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/pages/DroidAhead/289548237761313Follow us on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/droidaheadWebsite: http://www.droidahead.comAmazingText is compatible with all Android devices (phones and tablets) that run at least Android 1.6.Devices:- Honeycomb tablets (Android 3.0/3.1/3.2 or Ice Cream Sandwich 4.0) - such as Motorola Xoom, Samsung Galaxy Tab 8.9 and 10.1, Asus Eee Pad Transformer, Acer Iconia A100/A500, Lenovo ThinkPad, Sony S1, Toshiba AT100, Archo G9, Huawei MediaPad, ..- Ice Cream Sandwich (Android 4.0) - Samsung Galaxy Nexus.- Gingerbread (2.3), Froyo (2.2), Eclair (2.1), Donut (1.6): Samsung Galaxy S, Samsung Galaxy S 2 (II), Samsung Galaxy Note, HTC Desire S/HD, Motorola Defy, Samsung Epic Touch 4G, HTC Evo 3D, HTC Sensation, HTC Fyler, Motorola Droid Razr, Sony Xperia, ..

reviews.title: Works, beautiful
reviews.comment: I now have a beautiful cursive \"I love you\" under my husband\'s picture on one of my screens. Simple, beautiful.
reviews.author: Rose Ramirez

reviews.title: Nice But...
reviews.comment: This app is great. I have been looking for a good contact widget for awhile, now I found one.  (The direct dial isn\'t working)
reviews.author: Jeramie King

reviews.title: FAS
reviews.comment: Very creative, thoughtful, clever and personally useful software. Very artistic at that.
reviews.author: Antonio Flores

reviews.title: Just beautiful
reviews.comment: Makes my tablet so beautiful. My boyfriend gave me his phone and told me to add  anything to it. I downloaded this widget and left a few love texts all over his phone. My reward was a night on the town, fabulous dinner, and a night off;) one of my favorite apps. Thanks
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wdf
reviews.comment: I m using go launcher ex....i want text on home secreen...d problem is that my screen is full emty bt stil it say not enf room... plz fix it...
reviews.author: Sneha Patil

reviews.title: Fantastic!
reviews.comment: Excellent app love it. Works so well especially as a font viewer if you have a lot of fonts as I do. Great application, this one is a keeper.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: An option to edit spacing between letters would be nice (as far as I know the plus can\'t do it either, correct me if I\'m wrong). Other than that, \303\255t\'s easy to use and I recommend it.
reviews.author: D\303\241niel Horv\303\241th

reviews.title: Simply Fabulous
reviews.comment: Love it!  It\'s like stealth mode apps right on your home screen... Only you know they are there. Easy setup too.  Great for text labels to direct dial contacts or sms.  Works perfect  on galaxy tab   fascinate, evo  4g, evo view & galaxy 7.7 tab p6800. Awesome!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pretty darn good
reviews.comment: Great customization options, &  I love how it saves your profiles automatically, & that you can continue tweaking after the \'texts\' have been placed on your screen. Needs improvement on screen grid alignment, though. Like many things on Android, placement/alignment on the screen grid is goofy. But, its \"extra goofy\' with this app. The \'Texts\' you place take up a lot of elbow room on the screen grid, & step on your other widgets & push them around. Can\'t place close to other widgets without interfetence.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app but needs resizing option.
reviews.comment: This is a fantastic app and the free version is great. It would be nice to have a size option (1x1, 1x2 2x1, etc..) the widgets take up 4x1 on default. I worked around this by using Apex launcher and just resizing so you can get 2 next to each other, but other than that its great.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun!
reviews.comment: An awesome way to add customization to your phone with many font styles and effects for custom text creations. It also gives you the option to link them to apps and shortcuts. A fun app that lets you set your phone apart!
reviews.author: Susan Chartier

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Does almost everything I want. The only thing to make it perfect is could we please specify a background colour and/or a 1px border, and it would be awesome if we could set it so that when you tap the widget that it goes straight into the \"edit text\" dialog, just to save a few taps if you edit the text frequently. Thanks for the great app!
reviews.author: Matthew Gordon

reviews.title: It\'s amazing and it\'s free!
reviews.comment: Fantastic customisable text widgets, as many as you like! Loads of powerful effects, and completely free. I have 8 2x1 or 1x1 across 6 pages of home screen. Superb app - highly recommended!
reviews.author: Alex Churchill

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: I am a very critical reviewer and this app deserves every high rating it gets. What an incredibly rish feature set. One small comment: on creation of a new widget, renaming that long default title is a pain. The keyboard should pop up immediately when editing the text so that the highlighted default text can be erased in one swift use of the backspace.
reviews.author: Daniel Martinez

reviews.title: Does what it says!
reviews.comment: I use the widgets to separate homescreens - like Utilities/Social/Media and whatnot... needless to say, it excels at that.
reviews.author: Magmagan Alex

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.comment: Makes a really cool home screen.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool!
reviews.comment: Very awesome
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: 5 stars
reviews.comment: This is the first application i rated 5 ..because of its creativity and the free version performs exactly what it claims to perform..no annoying limitation.. i cannot make any playstore purchase but my gf purchased it on my recommendations
reviews.author: Francis Ralte

reviews.comment: Chancdless, amazing, my tab looks so beautiful, thanks

reviews.title: Uninstalled
reviews.comment: This app has me so frustrated maybey its just me or maybey u have to buy the full version but the only widget it will let me customize is (the amazing text widget) this type of app should not be so complicated or at least give info about having to pay to actually use it
reviews.author: thomas gorrell
